strong.description: negative (danger) & critical information, such as the borders on invalid text fields

subtle.description: borders of secondary elements with negative (danger) & critical information, such as inline banner
borders of secondary elements communicating caution, such as inline banner

strong.description: borders of elements with successful outcome, e.g., validated text fields

subtle.description: borders of secondary elements with successful outcome

strong.description: border of neutral elements, can have informative meaning

subtle.description: border of secondary neutral elements, can have informative meaning

primary.description: visually grouping or separating primary UI elements, e.g, side panels, navigation

secondary.description: visually grouping or separating secondary UI elements, e.g, accordion dividers

default.description: background in any type of form field (input, radio, checkbox)

hovered.description: background in any type of form field (input, radio, checkbox)

active.description: background in any type of form field (input, radio, checkbox)

disabled.description: background in any type of form field (input, radio, checkbox)

active.description: background in any type of form field (input, radio, checkbox)

disabled.description: background in any type of form field (input, radio, checkbox)

tertiary.description: input field placeholder, helper text etc.

primaryInverted.description: body copy, headers etc. on inverted bg

secondaryInverted.description: body copy, headers etc. on inverted bg
